articles.title: Chhavi Mittal diagnosed with breast cancer. Writes 'I might not look the same again' as she begins her battle - India Today
articles.description: SIT actress Chhavi Mittal has been diagnosed with breast cancer. Taking to Instagram, she informed her fans that she has begun her battle against cancer with positivity.
